A

approxPolyDP(ArrayList<PContour.Point>, float) - Method in class pcontour.PContour
Simplify contour using Douglas Peucker algorithm.
approxPolySimple(ArrayList<PContour.Point>) - Method in class pcontour.PContour
Simplify contour by removing definately extraneous vertices, without modifying shape of the contour.

P

pcontour - package pcontour
 
PContour - Class in pcontour
Finding contours in binary images and approximating polylines.
PContour() - Constructor for class pcontour.PContour
 
PContour.Contour - Class in pcontour
Data structure for a contour, encodes vertices as well as hierarchical relationship to other contours
PContour.Point - Class in pcontour
Data structure for an integer-aligned coordinate on bitmap image
